other_tests.findings: Gallbladder sludge and a mobile shadowing 2.4 cm gallstone in the fundus, an additional stone in gallbladder neck measuring approximately 1.8 cm, mild gallbladder wall edema measuring 4 mm in thickness, no intrahepatic biliary dilation, main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow, liver, pancreas, spleen, and kidneys appear within normal limits.
